sentence.Network_en: I swept rainwater off the flat top of a gravestone.

sentence.Network_en: The letters on this gravestone have been worn away with time.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着时间的流逝,墓碑上的文字已经被磨损.

entry.def: A gravestone is a large stone with words carved into it, which is placed on a grave.

means.word_mean: 1. a stone that is used to mark a grave

sentences.en: Centuries of wind and rain had worn away the inscriptions on the gravestones.
